name: Grand Battle Stadium
description:
Overview

This is an attempt on a platformer-fighter collab on some of GB Studio's game / developer pioneers, made for the GB Compo 2021.

The project is a collab with the following games and developers:

  • Chris Maltby https://chrismaltby.itch.io/untitled-gb-game
  • Pixel Pete https://petermilko.itch.io/gurbs-adventure
  • maxoakland https://maxoakland.itch.io/wink-gameboy
  • Skittles https://skittlesfiddles.itch.io/repugnant-bounty-retrobreak-build-1
  • RainBowChild https://rainbowchild.itch.io/the-legend-of-the-mist-prince
  • LazyDev https://lazydevs.itch.io/birb
  • Pearacidic https://pearacidic.itch.io/little-nemo-the-slumberland-hero
  • skRap Klan https://skrap-klan.itch.io/bulb
  • Stranger https://astrangerontheinternet.itch.io/samurai-on-the-gbc
  • Spacebot Interactive https://spacebot-interactive.itch.io/dragonborne-adventure-rpg-gameboy 
Controls Files included
  • Game rom [.gbc file] that can be played with an emulator or flashed in a cart reader and then slapped in an actual GameBoy Color hardware.
  • Original Game Project [.zip file] that can be opened and edited with GB Studio 2beta5 [Please Credit the creators who contributed to the project]

Github Repo: https://github.com/ELV13Stm/GBStadium-Collab-Project

Warning before editing:
  • When selecting events that target [self Actor] please specify the said actor, for some reason leaving it on [self] will actually target the Player instead.
  • Permanent Variable assigned for OnGround/Air check is Var5
  • Engine Mods included UI Interactable Mod, Actor Bits, Move Towards/Away, Extra Engine [Player X Velocity], Switched A and B Inputs, No Limit Menu  
Patch Notes

Ver 0.0.1

  • Added an Extra Mode in  Main Menu [Gallery, Music Test]
  • Added Practice Mode in Main Menu

Support me by following the itch page and/or my twitter account or by donating some. Until the next game dev!

https://twitter.com/ELVIEStm
